price: 15. Wuxuuna ka saari  ciilkii hayey quluubtooda. Alle wuxuu ka toobad aqbalaa qofkuu doono, Allena waa wax kasta Ogsoone, Xakiim ah.
arabic: وَيُذۡهِبۡ غَيۡظَ قُلُوبِهِمۡۗ وَيَتُوبُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wayudh'hib ghayẓa qulūbihim wayatūbu al-lahu ʿalā man yashāu wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
